meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Learn about how Divo collects, uses, and protects your personal information

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Divo, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform. Please read this privacy policy carefully. By continuing to use our service, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this policy.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on our platform, express interest in obtaining information about us or our services, or otherwise contact us.
items: Contact information (name, email address, phone number)

automaticData.title: Automatically Collected Data
automaticData.content: When you access our platform, we may automatically collect certain information about your device and usage, including:
items: Usage patterns and interaction with the platform
Time and date of your visits

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We may use the information we collect from you for various purposes, including:

purposes.title: Provide and maintain our services
purposes.description: Process appointments, manage your account, and deliver the functionality of our platform

purposes.title: Improve and personalize your experience
purposes.description: Analyze usage data to enhance and customize our services to your preferences

purposes.title: Communication
purposes.description: Contact you regarding your account, appointments, or responding to your inquiries

purposes.title: Security
purposes.description: Monitor and protect our platform, services, and users from fraudulent or illegal activity

purposes.title: Legal compliance
purposes.description: Comply with applicable laws, legal processes, and respond to lawful requests

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We may share or disclose your information in the following situations:

situations.title: Healthcare Providers
situations.description: We share your information with healthcare providers to facilitate medical appointments and services

situations.title: Service Providers
situations.description: We may employ third-party companies to facilitate our service, provide service on our behalf, or assist us in analyzing how our service is used

situations.title: Legal Requirements
situations.description: We may disclose your information where required by law, governmental request, or to protect our rights

situations.title: Business Transfers
situations.description: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as a business asset

dataSecurityAndStorage.title: Data Security and Storage
dataSecurityAndStorage.content: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your personal information. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your information, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our policies.

yourRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
Rectify or update your personal data
Request deletion of your personal data
Object to the processing of your personal data
yourRights.request: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details provided in the 'Contact Us' section.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our platform is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal data, please contact us.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by Divo. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at:
